Key Match Events: Alperen Sengun recorded a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 5 assists
Ja Morant paced the Grizzlies with 27 points
Jaren Jackson Jr. had 21 points and 8 rebounds
Santi Aldama came off the bench to finish with 12 points and 9 rebounds
Aaron Holiday preserved the win for Houston with two free throws with 2.6 seconds left
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis shot 50 percent but was undone by 20 turnovers, which Houston converted into 31 points
The Grizzlies trailed by 10 early in the fourth quarter but scrapped back to cut the deficit to 115-114 with 2:49 to go
Houston used a 25-9 run to go up 31-19 in the first quarter
The Rockets extended the lead to 61-44 midway through the second quarter following a hook shot by Sengun
Memphis rallied in the closing minutes of the half to trim the Houston advantage to 68-63 at the break
